title: üõ†Ô∏è MISP tool MCP server üí™ all 44 operations
description:
Need help? Want access to this workflow + many more paid workflows + live Q&A sessions with a top verified n8n creator?

[Join the community](https://www.skool.com/beyond-nodes-automation-lab-2006/about)

Complete MCP server exposing all MISP Tool operations to AI agents. Zero configuration needed - all 44 operations pre-built.

## ‚ö° Quick Setup

1. **Import** this workflow into your n8n instance
2. **Activate** the workflow to start your MCP server
3. **Copy** the webhook URL from the MCP trigger node
4. **Connect** AI agents using the MCP URL

## üîß How it Works

‚Ä¢ **MCP Trigger**: Serves as your server endpoint for AI agent requests
‚Ä¢ **Tool Nodes**: Pre-configured for every MISP Tool operation
‚Ä¢ **AI Expressions**: Automatically populate parameters via `$fromAI()` placeholders
‚Ä¢ **Native Integration**: Uses official n8n MISP Tool tool with full error handling

## üìã Available Operations (44 total)

Every possible MISP Tool operation is included:

### üîß Attribute (6 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an attribute**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an attribute**
‚Ä¢ **Get an attribute**
‚Ä¢ **Get many attributes**
‚Ä¢ **Get a filtered list of attributes**
‚Ä¢ **Update an attribute**

### üìÖ Event (8 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an event**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an event**
‚Ä¢ **Get an event**
‚Ä¢ **Get many events**
‚Ä¢ **Publish an event**
‚Ä¢ **Get a filtered list of events**
‚Ä¢ **Unpublish an event**
‚Ä¢ **Update an event**

### üîß Eventtag (2 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Add a tag to an event**
‚Ä¢ **Remove a tag from an event**

### üîß Feed (6 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a feed**
‚Ä¢ **Disable a feed**
‚Ä¢ **Enable a feed**
‚Ä¢ **Get a feed**
‚Ä¢ **Get many feeds**
‚Ä¢ **Update a feed**

### üîß Galaxy (3 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Delete a galaxy**
‚Ä¢ **Get a galaxy**
‚Ä¢ **Get many galaxies**

### üîß Noticelist (2 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get a noticelist**
‚Ä¢ **Get many noticelists**

### üîß Object (1 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get a filtered list of objects**

### üîß Organisation (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Delete an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Get an organization**
‚Ä¢ **Get many organizations**
‚Ä¢ **Update an organization**

### üè∑Ô∏è Tag (4 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a tag**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a tag**
‚Ä¢ **Get many tags**
‚Ä¢ **Update a tag**

### üë§ User (5 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Create a user**
‚Ä¢ **Delete a user**
‚Ä¢ **Get a user**
‚Ä¢ **Get many users**
‚Ä¢ **Update a user**

### üîß Warninglist (2 operations)

‚Ä¢ **Get a warninglist**
‚Ä¢ **Get many warninglists**

## ü§ñ AI Integration

**Parameter Handling**: AI agents automatically provide values for:
‚Ä¢ Resource IDs and identifiers
‚Ä¢ Search queries and filters
‚Ä¢ Content and data payloads
‚Ä¢ Configuration options

**Response Format**: Native MISP Tool API responses with full data structure

**Error Handling**: Built-in n8n error management and retry logic

## üí° Usage Examples

Connect this MCP server to any AI agent or workflow:

‚Ä¢ **Claude Desktop**: Add MCP server URL to configuration
‚Ä¢ **Custom AI Apps**: Use MCP URL as tool endpoint
‚Ä¢ **Other n8n Workflows**: Call MCP tools from any workflow
‚Ä¢ **API Integration**: Direct HTTP calls to MCP endpoints

## ‚ú® Benefits

‚Ä¢ **Complete Coverage**: Every MISP Tool operation available
‚Ä¢ **Zero Setup**: No parameter mapping or configuration needed
‚Ä¢ **AI-Ready**: Built-in `$fromAI()` expressions for all parameters
‚Ä¢ **Production Ready**: Native n8n error handling and logging
‚Ä¢ **Extensible**: Easily modify or add custom logic

> üÜì **[Free for community use](https://github.com/Cfomodz/community-use)!** Ready to deploy in under 2 minutes.
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
